description: Example for target.command (subprocess argv, no shell).

command:
import json,sys
from pathlib import Path
inp=Path(sys.argv[1])
out=Path(sys.argv[2])
out.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)
data=inp.read_bytes()
(out/'result.json').write_text(json.dumps({'bytes': len(data)})+'\n', encoding='utf-8')
print('OK bytes=%d'%len(data))
